answers.answer: YOU IDIOT GO SEE YOUr DOCTOR, If you can get to your doctor due to pain and current state of health call your doctor and ask what you should do to seek e mediate help, your doctor can give e mediate answers the  internet cant always..

question: For the past 4weeks I have been dealing with my hands feeling sensitive to the touch and tingling and numbness to the touch. Constant tingling and numbness in my feet hard to walk, my calves feel like they are tight and cant stretch them out. My hamstrings are so tight and my legs dont support me anymore. My knees give out cant walk faster then a slow walk. My lower back is always throbbing pain. My doctor thought I had diabetes before all this happen to me.So before I had all these symptoms, he gave me Glucotrol. After taking this for week and half. That is when all of the above things started happening to me. Place tell me what you think I have been doing a lot of reading and looks like to me it may be ALS. I have 7mo old little girl and I want to be around for her. Tell me what I should do?
title: Tingling hands,feet weak thighs and cant walk HELP!!!
